title: Uwork
subtitle: UI/UX Design & Web Development
description: At La Capsule Bootcamp, I conceptualized and brought to life Uwork, a cutting-edge mobile app. Uwork seamlessly bridges the gap between jobseekers and companies, revolutionizing the traditional hiring process by simplifying and democratizing it. Through this project, I demonstrate my mastery in mobile app development and UX design, creating a user-friendly and accessible platform.

title: thedailyjim
subtitle: Web Design & Web Development
description: During my free time, I have another name and a different passion alongside codingâ€”meet 'thedailyjim,' the photographer in me. Ever since my early years, I have been captivated by the art of photography, constantly seeking opportunities to venture beyond the confines of my home and capture the essence of life. Visit this website to explore a collection of my photos, frozen in time, presenting the awe-inspiring landscapes that have taken my breath away.

title: Decathlon #1
subtitle: Web Development
description: As a personal project, I recreated selected pages of the Decathlon website using Decathlon APIs just for fun. I successfully replicated web pages from scratch, demonstrating proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I prioritized attention to detail, responsiveness, and clean code to deliver a seamless user experience.

title: Decathlon #2
subtitle: Web Development
description: For fun, I recreated a Decathlon-inspired design using Decathlon APIs. I added features like a search bar, pagination (12 sports per page), and the ability to filter Decathlon represented sports. Emphasizing a seamless user experience, I followed coding best practices to enhance functionality in web design.

title: Jim's Pad
subtitle: Web Design & Web Development
description: Welcome to Jim's Pad - the go-to app that streamlines your note management tasks. With Jim's Pad, you can easily add, edit, and delete notes, ensuring you stay organized and in control of your information.
